post.body: Can't remember, but it was at the time ;)
Cork is the place to be on "1st Feb!
Go for it girl! They will carry your bags. I said so!
@sharon I wonder if it is the same flight? Like a school outing!
That's great.
I will travel to Dublin for a night or two and fly from there to cork with E&G, o/n in hotel all booked
*waves & blows kisses* that will make em jealous!
Hello John
who are you?
Who have I not met?
GM's Toyboys will sit on cushions at her feet!
Yes Sharon, do it fast!
'A little'! Why is the air so blue then?
Safe home John!
what about me? Am I all woman?
Worried? You kicked me to bits before you were born, then played rugby, drank pints... George is the one to be worried ;)
I'm travelling and registered - so youngwans show your colours!
He sounds like a clown and impossible to to take seriously!
I don't know any of the younger ones since I have no TV
The moon was in the sky very late this am
When they speak clearly. That Robert Peston is a pain in theproverbial!
nom nom! Thanks it tastes great!
Is it local TV
Waiting with my mouth open!
Not all of them surely?
It is that.
WHY?
Spoilsport! No good if they can't clamber all over you.... with sticky fingers! :D
Got the email. It seems to have travelled round the globe umpteen times, I've had it about six times!
Thats ok than!
I won't be in Dublin this side of the new year
Are you on the booze again or have I missed something?
Just twitter it! ;)
Tep, I get to make my own pictures in my head!
I'm not! My life is one long holiday or so people tell me!
Hi Damien *waves*
Snap! I was there twice too.
Woo hoo for you @TrustTommy
Not me?
Is @mcawilliams recording the sips?
To wake up every day!
Its Stress Friday!! I know the feeling I had it on the phone from a guy this am. He and his problems were in Dublin not miney
The post you sent me from the MetroNewspaper has just arrived. Many thanks.
There is always someone starting out and needing help
Good idea!
Household Hints? lol
I need my SIL to sort it out for me!
I see @Grandad got his. Mine still on way.
work well, holidays not far away now. ;-)
Enjoy the show and take pics, cause you soon forget!
Hello sunshine. How are you tonight?
Great pics, brought back my childhood!
Tired? A young thing like you?
Welcome home, the place was quiet without you.
Bright? I wonder if I should clean my windows....!
Hows you today?
That would include you! EVERYONE on twitter is younger than me! :(
That @TrustTommy is dangerous! He chats up older women all over twittrerland ;_
Bed young man and Hot port is my remedy, and no I won't rub your back.
You enjoy the rain. My brother in Oz collects their occasional rain to make tea!
Happy New Year and I hope it is a good one. Never heard of that milk, been without for so long, not sure I'd like it.
LOL
I didn't know you were in Ireland again! Enjoy the walk
nn young man!
Imagine my Elly was once 6lbs 12ozs and 18ins long
Wait till she turns 30 like my baby!
You blinked! Wish the young lady a Happy Birthday from me.
Ok, I am muddled tonight think I need a coffe, only one so far today.I did well!
Sorry which bit do you relate to?
@darraghdoyle http://is.gd/eqYB
I had only one all Christmas and that was the only seasonal food I had
OK, here I go: @Donncha, @Trust Tommy, @Distant Rambler & @ellybabes whoever she is!
ROFLOL! Forgot that bit.
It works again Yippee!
I'm signing off to go read my book. Tomorrow people. Have fun!
cathy Clugston on Radio 4 has a great voice and diction
Is it local TV?
Outside world calls l8rs my beauties.
Morning Guys & Gals. My pal needs help" http://is.gd/et20 You can say I sent you.
Need to close up the eyes are tired. Good night all!
